allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Cognitive Map visualization for Steve Jobs

Implemented interactive cognitive map visualization based on Behrens et al. (2018) framework:

Features:
- Interactive graph visualization using React Flow
- 12 Place Cells (core conceptual anchors)
- 12 Grid Cells (connections between concepts)
- 5 Border Cells (cognitive boundaries)
- 4 Vector Cells (directional trajectories)
- 4 Cognitive Modules (functional clusters)
- Real-time node and edge details on click
- Color-coded by concept level and connection type
- Structural metrics display (Small-World Index, Clustering, etc.)

Technical Implementation:
- Created TypeScript types for cognitive map data structure
- Built CognitiveMap component with React Flow
- Added navigation from Clone Detail page
- Steve Jobs cognitive map fully implemented with 89% confidence
- Extensible architecture for adding more clones
